title: THE MURDER OF A MAILMAN
description: Deductive Logico went to check his PO box, but instead of finding a royalty check for Murdle: Volume 1, he found that a mailman had been killed, and the whole place was closed. Neither rain nor shine, thought Logico, but they close at the first sign of murder...

suspects.name: DR. CRIMSON
suspects.description: She's the smartest doctor she's ever met, according to her, and she's probably right. Yeah, her diet is horrible, but if she has a heart attack, she'll operate on herself.

suspects.name: MAYOR HONEY
suspects.description: He knows where the bodies are buried, and he makes sure they always vote for him.

suspects.name: GENERAL COFFEE
suspects.description: An espresso connoisseur who prefers the smell of coffee to napalm in the morning.

weapons.name: A LETTER OPENER
weapons.description: A sharp knife used by people who won't just rip their letters open.

weapons.name: A STAMP STAMP
weapons.description: A stamp for stamping over stamps.

weapons.name: A HEAVY PACKAGE
weapons.description: With a nice red ribbon that'll conceal blood stains.

locations.name: A MAIL TRUCK
locations.description: Practically indestructible, so it's great for joyrides, so long as you're not the one paying for gas.

locations.name: THE LONG LINE
locations.description: People standing in line, waiting to mail their letters.

locations.name: THE SORTING ROOM
locations.description: Where the postal workers sort the junk mail, bills, and catalogs using a great machine.

clues: Letter openers were not allowed in the sorting room, ever since "the Incident," and that rule was not broken today.
The suspect with the heavy package was self-conscious about their baldness and would prefer it not be mentioned in clues.

statements.speaker: Mayor Honey
statements.statement: Dr. Crimson was not in a mail truck.

statements.speaker: General Coffee
statements.statement: A letter opener was in a mail truck.
